preconditions.precondition: User is authenticated and has necessary permissions.

mainSequence.step: User sends a POST request to Spider to create a driver with specified details.
Spider creates the driver and updates the Spider database.
Spider sends the created driver information back to the User.
User sends a POST request to Spider to create a region with specified details.
Spider creates the region and updates the Spider database.
Spider sends the created region information back to the User.
User sends a POST request to Spider to create a credential with specified details.
Spider creates the credential and updates the Spider database.
Spider sends the created credential information back to the User.
User sends a POST request to Spider to create a connection configuration with specified details.
Spider creates the connection configuration and updates the Spider database.
Spider sends the created connection configuration information back to the User.
User sends a POST request to Tumblebug to create a namespace with specified details.
Tumblebug creates the namespace and updates the Tumblebug database.
Tumblebug sends the created namespace information back to the User.
